casebody.data:
No. 666,

October Term, 1940.

Detrola Radio & Television Corp. v. Hazeltine Corporation. October 13, 1941.

The opinion is amended by substituting the figure “8” for the figure “9” in the seventh line of the third paragraph of the opinion. The petition for rehearing is denied.

Opinion reported as amended, 313 U. S. 261.
